The animator context the transaction belongs to.
AnimatorContext.Scene - Interface in is.hello.go99.animators
A scene owns an animator context and should contain a collection of related views where tracking and coordinating animation life-cycles is useful.
AnimatorContext.Transaction - Class in is.hello.go99.animators
A pending collection of animators that will be run together within a containing animator context.
AnimatorContext.TransactionConsumer - Interface in is.hello.go99.animators
A functor that takes a AnimatorContext.Transaction instance, and adds animators to it.
AnimatorContext.TransactionOptions - Annotation Type in is.hello.go99.animators
 
animatorFor(View) - Method in class is.hello.go99.animators.AnimatorContext.Transaction
Creates a MultiAnimator for a given view, configuring it according to the transaction's template (if applicable), and starting it together with all other animations contained in the transaction.
animatorFor(View) - Static method in class is.hello.go99.animators.MultiAnimator
Creates a multi-animator for a given view, unbound to any animator context.
animatorFor(View, AnimatorContext) - Static method in class is.hello.go99.animators.MultiAnimator
Creates a multi-animator for a given view, and binds it to a given animator context.
AnimatorTemplate - Class in is.hello.go99.animators
Read-only class that encapsulates the attributes common to different animation classes in the Android SDK.

apply(T) - Method in class is.hello.go99.animators.AnimatorTemplate

apply(LayoutTransition) - Method in class is.hello.go99.animators.AnimatorTemplate

apply(Animation) - Method in class is.hello.go99.animators.AnimatorTemplate
